body_html: I think it would be better to have a helper function calculating expanded sizes and strides in TH, that is called from both TH and THC (similar to view, https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensor.c#L231), rather than have 2 almost verbatim similar TH(C)Tensor_(newExpand) doing that in TH and THC.
